creator: Subsplash Inc
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the official "Thru the Bible Radio Network" app. Follow along with Dr. J. Vernon McGee in a five-year journey through the whole Word of God. Enjoy listening to today’s broadcast or on-demand by selecting a program from our archives. Download for offline listening and share it with your friends and family via Twitter, Facebook, or email.

For more information about Thru the Bible visit, www.TTB.org or call us at 1-800-65-BIBLE.

The "Thru the Bible Radio App" was created with The Church App by Subsplash.
descriptionShort: Listen daily to Dr. J. Vernon McGee's Bible content and enjoy free resources.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release includes new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements.
New:
- You can now reorder your media downloads to listen in the order you want.
- Media search has been removed from the app header and is now in the left navigation menu.
Improved:
- Messaging now loads faster!
- Better support for Subsplash Live.
Fixed:
- Fixed several issues where push notifications were not opening Messaging correctly.
- Fixed issue where messages were appearing in the wrong channel.

title: Thru the Bible Radio Network

descriptionShort: Listen daily to Dr. J. Vernon McGee's Bible content and enjoy free resources.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in Messaging (if enabled):
- You can send files to one another
- You can mention someone using an @ symbol to notify them directly.
- Channel managers can restrict channel invites to managers
- Managers can also set artwork and descriptions for a group channel
- Administers can set channels to be public for anyone to join

Fixed:
- Media playback now stops when you force close the app
- Fixed a Messaging issue causing link previews to cause the channel to crash

title: Thru the Bible Radio Network

creator: Subsplash Inc
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the official "THRU the BIBLE Radio Network" app.

Follow along with Dr. J. Vernon McGee in a five-year journey through the whole Word of God. Enjoy listening to today’s broadcast or in your own time, on-demand in our program archives, where you can download for offline listening. Share your Bible experiences with your friends and family natively to Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, SMS, or email.

For more information about THRU the BIBLE visit us online at TTB.org or call us at 1-800-65-BIBLE.

The "Thru the Bible Radio Network" App was created in partnership with The Church App by Subsplash.
descriptionShort: Journey "Thru the Bible" daily with Dr. J. Vernon McGee.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: If enabled, the app will show the viewer a prompt to take an action at a designated time during a live stream.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If enabled, Messaging now includes threaded conversations and sharing Bible passages! Also, you can now easily see which messages have not been read since you last opened a conversation.
- The Account screen has been updated with several improvements.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If enabled, audio for the Bible reading plan has been improved.
- If enabled, Messaging channels now include a "Threads" tab to show all active discussions, and the user interface has been refreshed.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

title: Thru the Bible Radio Network

descriptionShort: Journey "THRU the BIBLE" daily with Dr. J. Vernon McGee.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We've consolidated Listen and Watch into a single Play button on the media player. Users can still switch between listening and watching modes.
- If enabled, Messaging now features an option to silence all notifications for a predetermined period of time.
- You can now start Picture-in-picture playback in the player to watch video and browse the app at the same time.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Media Search Experience with support for Speakers, Topics, and Scripture tags
- New Related media section on Media Items shows other media tagged with the same Topics
- Enhanced user profile with additional field and a direct integration to our CMS for Messaging Customers
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.
